name: AnimeShow.tv Dark
description:
THIS IS NOT UPDATED ANYMORE (ATM it works but it might break) use https://www.masterani.me/ instead. A much better website!


This is a nice and dark theme for AnimeShow.tv, specially made for thoes who hate bright backgrounds at night. It will get updated whenever it is necesarely or if someone manages to find a bug. Feel free to leave sugestions! Also has mobile support.
additional_info:
Version: 2.3 (26/3/2016) - A little modification to accentuate the over elements
Version: 2.2 (14/3/2016) - New genres page support
Version: 2.1 (3/9/2016) - Responsive compatibility (Thank you marktheman)
Version: 2.0 (3/1/2016) - Updated style to the new layout
Let me know if you find any bugs/odd things.
I will try to update it every time it is necesarely. Fell free to post any kind of sugestionm, I don't bite, if you don't like something comment on it and I'll think about changing it.
Version: 1.0 (23/12/2015)

Credits:
- marktheman noticed the colors missing for responsive version of the website!
